Summary: Bright orblike star shaped object appeared then got further away west and then dissappeared. Then reappeared at its original location 5 mins later.
divs: sighting detailsi was watching the sunset on my deck still daylight and no clouds near the location of this object. a starlike\circular ufo appeared north west. the object began to move at supersonic rate heading west out to the gulf then vanished. minutes later it reappeared at its original location and vanished seconds later. i still have a feeling as if whoever was inside the craft knew i was watching. this was a massive object and i pray someone else witnessed this event. i am a sky watcher and have had many experiences in the past. truthfully, i had a feeling i would see something as clear as it was.
trends: There have been 20 other sightings in Venice
There were no other sightings in Venice on or around October 1st 2012
